name: DaggerDash
description:
Hi everyone ! This is my very first game ever!

It's a 2D scroller where you can launch dagger and teleport to them, the goal is simply aiming for the highest score.

There's also a shop system where you can buy power-up. To buy from there, you have earn coins while playing!

Although I don't plan on working on this game anymore, I'll gladly take feedback for future game-making! :D

Ennache.
